data.sentence: The word ذَوَاتَا comes from the root ذ و and is associated with the meanings:

data.meanings: drove away, disperse, delay/defer, cheat/deceive/defraud/overreach, consist of different sorts/modes/manners, diversification, mix/confuse/vary, versatility, sorts/species, a branch of a tree, have branches.
data.sentence: The word أَفْنَانٍ comes from the root ف ن ن and is associated with the meanings: drove away, disperse, delay/defer, cheat/deceive/defraud/overreach, consist of different sorts/modes/manners, diversification, mix/confuse/vary, versatility, sorts/species, a branch of a tree, have branches.
